contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Fernelmont |picture=Noville-les-Bois CH1cJPG.jpg |picture-legend=Fortified farmhouse of Fernelmont |map=Fernelmont Namur Belgium Map.png |map-legend=Location of Fernelmont in the province of Namur |arms=Blason ville be Fernelmont (Namur).svg |flag= |region={{BE-REG-WAL}} |community={{BE-FR}} |province={{BE-PROV-NM}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Namur|Namur]] |nis=92138 |pyramid-date |0-19= |20-64 |65 |foreigners= |foreigners-date |mayor=Jean-Claude Nihoul |majority=LDB |postal-codes=5380 |telephone-area=081 |web=[http://www.fernelmont.be/ www.fernelmont.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=33 |lon_deg=04 |lon_min=59 }} '''Fernelmont''' ({{IPA-fr|fɛʁ.nɛl.mɔ̃}}) is a [[Wallonia|Walloon]] [[municipality]] located in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[Namur (province)|Namur]]. On January 1, 2012 Fernelmont had a total population of 7,360. The total area is 65.61 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 112.2 inhabitants per km². == Villages == * [[Bierwart]] * [[Cortil-Wodon]] * [[Forville]] * [[Franc-Waret]] * [[Hemptinne]] * [[Hingeon]] * [[Marchovelette]] * [[Noville-les-Bois]] * [[Pontillas]] * [[Tillier]] === [[Hamlet]]s=== * [[Gochenée (Fernelmont)|Gochenée]] ''(Forville)'' * [[Hambraine]] ''(Cortil-Wodon)'' * [[Sart-d'Avril]] ''(Noville-les-Bois)'' * [[Seressiat]] ''(Forville)'' * [[Seron (Fernelmont)|Seron]] ''(Forville)'' [[Image:Noville-les-Bois CH1aJPG.jpg|thumb|left|'''Fernelmont''', the old keep (XIIIth century).|250px]] ==References== {{reflist}} {{commonscat}} {{Namur}} [[Category:Municipalities of Namur (province)]] {{Namur-geo-stub}}
